Question: The following year, the BRIT Award for Outstanding Contribution to Music went to this person.
Hints: On 23 March 1973, this person was ordered to leave the US within 60 days.
Starr's Goodnight Vienna (1974) again saw assistance from this person, who wrote the title track and played piano.
This person's playing of a mouth organ during a bus journey to visit his cousin in Scotland caught the driver's ear.
